title: Who is the Best Champion?
body:
Not lore based or most fun or most balanced. I'm wondering who you guys think is the best champion over the entirety of leagues existence and not just for one patch their consistent state.

I would have to vote for Janna hasn't fallen below a 50% win rate since I started playing the game daily back in 2014 and rarely falls below a 10% play rate.

replies.body:
If we're going off of win rates, Quinn is currently the best champion in the game right now, holding both first and second place with a 55% win rate.

Source: https://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend
I said consistent state so I would not count Quinn because she has been garbage for long periods of time

> [{quoted}](name=LeAnime,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wAAtcaTt,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2018-07-30T19:40:06.696+0000)
>
> I said consistent state so I would not count Quinn because she has been garbage for long periods of time

Hmmm...

I don't know then.

Zed?

Zed.

{{champion:17}} 
Most adaptive champion who can play all positions.
Zoe has been broken for the majority of her existence.

{{champion:75}} 
AD or AD, tank mode or megaburst, can build pretty much any item in the game and have some use from it, splitpush or teamfight uses, can be in any comp,  but has some very apparently weaknesses
{{champion:202}} has been powerful for his entire existence
